## Promotion
<p>Using mamikos.com is already a great way to promote your HMO. This online marketplace let students communicate to HMO owner and find the HMO of their preferences. But with many HMOs being promoted in this site, your HMO may be drowned in the sea of other HMOs. So, there have to be a way to promote your HMO in mamikos.com. There may be an algorithm that delviered the HMOs most needed by the consumer. There may also be a way to pay more to mamikos.com to advertise HMOs. But in this, case we are not going to review these options</p>
